401.description: Error: Unauthorized. When supplied credentials are invalid.

Scores student reponse to a given question.

questionSetId.description: Question Set Id of scored item

ohmUniqueId.description: Unique Question Id of scored item

scores.description: Contains weighted scores for given question

raw.description: Contains raw scores for given question

allans.description: True if all answer parts of question are provided otherwise false

partTypes.description: For multi-part questions, contains the question part types (choices, number, etc)

post.summary: Scores student reponse to a given list of questions.
Create questions from MGA question data.

questions.description: Anthony wants to make sure he has a good credit score.  Which of the following actions will have the largest impact on his score?
questions.text: Anthony wants to make sure he has a good credit score.  Which of the following actions will have the largest impact on his score?
choices: Waiting as long as possible to get a credit card
Establishing a few different types of credit between loans and credit cards

questions.description: Maya is concerned about her credit problems and is worried about the debt she’s accumulated throughout college. Which of the following strategies is the most advisable for Maya?
questions.text: Maya is concerned about her credit problems and is worried about the debt she’s accumulated throughout college. Which of the following strategies is the most advisable for Maya?
choices: Defer payments to a later date
Look for a reputable credit counselor

feedbacks: Incorrect. While some student loans allow deferment, Maya must have an accepted reason to defer payments. Credit card debt is much harder and costs more to defer.

Correct! Credit counselors offer debt management plans in which they work with credit card and loan companies to arrange a deal and ask you for monthly deposits so that they can help you pay off your debts.
Incorrect. While this may give her more time to pay off her debt, consolidating to one payment can cost more and accrue a higher interest rate.

Incorrect. Bankruptcy is an official status obtained through court procedures meaning that you are unable to pay off your debts. Bankruptcy damages your credit score, and the fees for filing paperwork and hiring an attorney are costly, so it should be used only as a last resort.

question_mappings.description: Mappings of MGA file GUIDs to newly created OHM question IDs.

has_valid_access_code.description: Does the user have a valid access code?

is_opted_out_of_assessments.description: Is the user opted out of assessments?

created_at.description: The creation timestamp for the enrollment.

text.description: The question's text. (also known as question prompt)

choices.description: All available choices for a multiple choice question. Omit for other question types.

type.description: The type of feedback being provided.

feedbacks.description: Per-answer feedback. This array index should match the choices index.

status.description: The status of OHM question creation.

errors.description: Errors encountered during question creation, if any.
